assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the Institutional Review Board of Yokohama City University Faculty of Medicine. After obtaining written informed consent, peripheral blood leukocytes were collected from the patients and their parents.
